data.title: Online WebP to PNG converter
data.meta_description: Free online WebP to PNG / APNG converter. Upload your WebP file and click "Convert to PNG". Then you can download or edit the produced PNG image. Animated WebP files will be converted to APNG.
data.text:
Online WebP to PNG / WebP to APNG converter

WebP is a relatively new image format with good compression and image quality, but is not yet supported by all web browsers and image viewers. If you have an image in WebP format and you want to convert it to PNG format, this tool is one of the simplest ways to do it.

Simply upload your WebP file and select "Convert to PNG!" to start the process. After conversion, the resulting PNG file is available for download or further editing.

For animated WebP files, the tool converts them into APNG format, maintaining the animation.
